s3games.robot

Class CameraObjectType

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.robot.CameraObjectType

  • public class CameraObjectType
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies the color (in HSV model) and size range for a particular element type and state as appears in the image frame seen from the camera. An example would be hue:82-167, saturation:0.3-1.0, value:0.5-1.0, size:200-5000, elementType:greenFrog, elState:1
